Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
Absence
The Absence class represents an absence or leave taken by an employee.
AbsenceDbController
This windowcontrollers provides an API for managing absences.
AbsenceDbRepository
The AbsenceDbRepository interface provides a MongoDB repository for storing and retrieving Absence data.
AbsenceDbService
This service provides an API for managing absences.
AddEmployeeWindowController
Controller for the Add Employee Window.
AddShiftTypeWindowController
Controller for the AddShiftTypeWindow.
AddShiftWindowController
Controller for the AddShift PopOver
CalendarWindowController
Controller for the Calendar Window in the application.
ChooseAbsencesMenu
This class is responsible for the absences' menu.
ConfigurationWindowController
This class is the windowControllers for the configuration window.
ConfirmDeleteEmployeeWindowController
This class is responsible for the logic of the ConfirmDeleteEmployeeView.
DeleteEmployeeHBox
Class responsible for creating a horizontal box (HBox) layout for each employee.
DeleteEmployeeWindowController
Controller class for ConfirmDeleteEmployee.fxml Manages the user interface for deleting employees.
Employee
Represents an employee in a company or organization.
EmployeeDbController
This windowcontrollers provides an API for managing employees.
EmployeeDbRepository
The EmployeeDbRepository interface extends the MongoRepository interface, providing additional methods for interacting with the MongoDB database.
EmployeeDbService
This service provides an API for managing employees.
EmployeeHBox
This class is responsible for creating a horizontal box (HBox) layout for each employee.
EmployeeInformationWindowController
Controller for the EmployeeInformation PopOver The user can see the information of an employee
FilterEmployeesController
Controller for the FilterEmployee PopOver The user can filter the employees by their qualifications
GridPaneTable
Extends the GridPane class to create a custom GridPaneTable.
ImageUtils
Utility class for image-related operations in the application.
InformationWindowController
Controller for managing the Information Window in the application.
IsObservable
Most basic interface for observing an object
IsObserver
Most basic interface for being an observer
LegendWindowController
Controller for the Legend.fxml file.
LoadingScreen
Class responsible for creating and managing a loading screen.
PDFExportController
This class is the windowcontrollers for the PDFExportWindow.fxml file.
PdfGenerator
The PdfGenerator class is responsible for creating and managing PDF documents related to employee shift schedules.
Qualification
The Qualification class models the concept of a professional or educational qualification within the system.
QualificationDbController
This windowcontrollers provides an API for managing qualifications.
QualificationDbRepository
The QualificationDbRepository interface extends the MongoRepository interface, providing additional methods for interacting with the MongoDB database.
QualificationDbService
This service provides an API for managing qualifications.
SettingWindowController
The SettingWindowController class is responsible for controlling the behavior of the setting window in the UI.
SetUpUI
The SetUpUI class is responsible for setting up the UI.
Shift
Represents a shift in the scheduling system.
ShiftDbController
This controller provides an API for managing shifts.
ShiftDbRepository
The ShiftDbRepository interface extends the MongoRepository interface, providing additional methods for interacting with the MongoDB database.
ShiftDbService
This service provides an API for managing shifts.
ShiftGenerator
This class is responsible for generating a shift plan based on the given shifts and employees.
ShiftInfoWindowController
Controller for the ShiftInfo PopOver
ShiftTableWindowController
Controller class for ShiftTableWindow.fxml This class is responsible for showing the ShiftTable.
ShiftType
Represents a type of shift in the scheduling system.
ShiftTypeDbController
This controller provides an API for managing shift types.
ShiftTypeDbRepository
The ShiftTypeDbRepository interface extends the MongoRepository interface, providing additional methods for interacting with the MongoDB database.
ShiftTypeDbService
This service provides an API for managing shift types.
ShiftTypeVBox
This class is responsible for creating the VBox for the Shift Here can the user add a shift or see the information of the shift
SproApplication
The main class of the application.
StartWindowController
Controller class for StartWindow.fxml This class is responsible for showing the start window (first window the user sees)
SystemDirector
The SystemDirector class acts as the central coordinator for the application's various components.
WindowControllerUtils
This class is used to show a PopOver window.
